title: Married At First Sight's Tamara Joy shows off new nose after plastic surgery
text:
Last week, Tamara Joy publicly unveiled her new nose for the first time since undergoing a rhinoplasty procedure earlier this month.

And on Thursday, the former Married At First Sight star gave fans a close-up look of her changing face.

The 30-year-old took to Instagram to post three photos of her new look, with her nose job healing up nicely.

'Yes I had a nose job and yes I love it!' Married At First Sight's Tamara Joy (pictured) showed off her surgically-enhanced face after undergoing rhinoplasty in an Instagram post on Thursday

She wrote in the caption: ' This one is for all you nosy people. I have had heaps of DM's asking me about my recent surgery so here it is!

The former reality star added proudly: 'Yes I have had a nose job and yes I love it.'

Explaining what fans could see in the photos, she wrote: 'I have zero make up on so you can see there is some bruising and some swelling as it's only been a few weeks.'

She wrote in the caption: ' This one is for all you nosy people. I have had heaps of DM's asking me about my recent surgery so here it is!'

Explaining what fans could see in the photos, she wrote: 'I have zero make up on so you can see there is some bruising and some swelling as it's only been a few weeks'

Judging by her current appearance, the rhinoplasty has made a huge difference to the star's look.

The tip of her nose appears to have been lifted, while her bridge has been straightened and filled out.

For her rhinoplasty, the reality star sought out the services of renowned facial plastic surgeon Dr Michael Zacharia.

She told fans: 'I want to say a massive thank you to the amazing @drzacharia and his team at the clinic!

Before and after: Tamara first unveiled her new nose last week. Pictured: Left, before her rhinoplasty, and right, after her surgery

Confident: The star debuted her new nose at an AFL grand final party last month (pictured)

'They made this process so easy and I can not thank them enough!'

The Bali-based socialite was spotted wincing in pain as she left Dr Zacharia's clinic in Sydney this month, with a large bandage across her nose.

Dr Zacharia has previously performed nose jobs on Bachelor stars like Megan Marx and Keira Maguire.

Tamara is no stranger to cosmetic enhancements, having previously undergone a breast enlargement and lip fillers.
description: Last week, Tamara Joy publicly unveiled her new nose for the first time since undergoing a rhinoplasty procedure earlier this month.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
